entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 17 March 2023
